name: Kali Linux
description: The penetration testing and security research distribution. Kali Linux comes with hundreds of security tools pre-installed.
longDescription: Kali Linux is the industry-standard distribution for penetration testing, security research, and digital forensics. Maintained by Offensive Security, it includes hundreds of pre-installed security tools organized into categories like information gathering, vulnerability analysis, and exploitation. While not intended for everyday desktop use, it's essential for security professionals and anyone learning about cybersecurity.

seo.title: OmniSet for Kali Linux | Security Tools Setup
seo.description: Extend Kali Linux with OmniSet. Add productivity tools and custom configurations to your security-focused Linux distribution.
